info.title: Azure Site Recovery Management Service API
info.description: A first party Azure service enabling the data replication.

get.description: Gets the details of the fabric agent.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of fabric agents in the given fabric.

200.description: Returns Dra Model Collection on success.

get.summary: Gets the fabric agent (Dra) operation status.
get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the fabric agent.
Gets the details of the alert configuration setting.

put.description: Creates an alert configuration setting for the given vault.

get.description: Gets the list of alert configuration settings for the given vault.

200.description: Returns EmailConfiguration Model Collection on success.

get.description: Gets the details of the event.
Gets the list of events in the given vault.

200.description: Returns Event Model Collection on success.

get.description: Gets the details of the fabric.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.
Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of fabrics in the given subscription.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token from the previous call.

200.description: Returns Fabric Model Collection on success.

get.description: Gets the list of fabrics in the given subscription and resource group.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token from the previous call.

200.description: Returns Fabric Model Collection on success.

get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the fabric.
Gets the details of the policy.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of policies in the given vault.

200.description: Returns Policy Model Collection on success.

get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the policy.
Gets the details of the protected item.

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to do force delete or not.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of protected items in the given vault.

200.description: Returns ProtectedItem Model Collection on success.

post.description: Performs the planned failover on the protected item.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.summary: Gets the protected item operation status.
get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the protected item.
Gets the details of the recovery point of a protected item.
Gets the list of recovery points of the given protected item.
Gets the details of the replication extension.

200.description: Returns Replication extension Model on success.

put.description: Creates the replication extension in the given vault.

delete.description: Deletes the replication extension in the given vault.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of replication extensions in the given vault.

200.description: Returns Replication extension Model Collection on success.

get.summary: Gets the replication extension operation status.
get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the replication extension.

post.summary: Performs the resource name availability check.

get.summary: Get a list of REST API operations supported by Microsoft.DataReplication.
get.description: Gets the operations.
Gets the details of the vault.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Tracking URL for long running operation.
Tracking URL for long running operation.

get.description: Gets the list of vaults in the given subscription.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token from the previous call.

200.description: Returns Vault Model Collection on success.

get.description: Gets the list of vaults in the given subscription and resource group.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token from the previous call.

200.description: Returns Vault Model Collection on success.

get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the vault.
Gets the details of the job.
Gets the list of jobs in the given vault.

200.description: Returns Workflow Model Collection on success.

get.description: Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the job.

as well as count of item affected by an specific issue.

HyperVToAzStackHCIEventModelCustomProper.description:
HyperV to  AzStackHCI event model custom properties. This class provides provider specific
details for events of type DataContract.HealthEvents.HealthEventType.ProtectedItemHealth and
DataContract.HealthEvents.HealthEventType.AgentHealth.

processed for all disks in the source VM.

initialReplicationProgressPercentage.description:
Gets or sets the initial replication progress percentage. This is calculated based on
total bytes processed for all disks in the source VM.

migrationProgressPercentage.description: Gets or sets the migration progress percentage.

resumeProgressPercentage.description: Gets or sets the resume progress percentage.

resyncProgressPercentage.description:
Gets or sets the resync progress percentage. This is calculated based on total bytes
processed for all disks in the source VM.

resyncRetryCount.description: Gets or sets the resync retry count.

resyncRequired.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether resync is required.

resyncState.description: Gets or sets the resync state.

performAutoResync.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether auto resync is to be done.

resumeRetryCount.description: Gets or sets the resume retry count.

lastReplicationUpdateTime.description: Gets or sets the latest timestamp that replication status is updated.

nicId.description: Gets or sets the NIC Id.

macAddress.description: Gets or sets the NIC mac address.

label.description: Gets or sets the NIC label.

isPrimaryNic.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is the primary NIC.

networkName.description: Gets or sets the network name.

targetNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the target network Id within AzStackHCI Cluster.

testNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the target test network Id within AzStackHCI Cluster.

selectionTypeForFailover.description: Gets or sets the selection type of the NIC.

VMwareToAzStackHCIReplicationExtensionMo.description: VMware to AzStackHCI Replication extension model custom properties.

vmwareFabricArmId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the source VMware fabric.

vmwareSiteId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the VMware site.

azStackHciFabricArmId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the target AzStackHCI fabric.

azStackHciSiteId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the AzStackHCI site.

storageAccountId.description: Gets or sets the storage account Id.

storageAccountSasSecretName.description: Gets or sets the Sas Secret of storage account.

asrServiceUri.description: Gets or sets the Uri of ASR.

rcmServiceUri.description: Gets or sets the Uri of Rcm.

gatewayServiceUri.description: Gets or sets the Uri of Gateway.

sourceGatewayServiceId.description: Gets or sets the gateway service Id of source.

targetGatewayServiceId.description: Gets or sets the gateway service Id of target.

sourceStorageContainerName.description: Gets or sets the source storage container name.

targetStorageContainerName.description: Gets or sets the target storage container name.

resourceLocation.description: Gets or sets the resource location.

resourceGroup.description: Gets or sets the resource group.

location.description: Gets or sets the location of the vault.

tags.description: Gets or sets the resource tags.

id.description: Gets or sets the Id of the resource.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the resource.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of vaults.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the value of next link.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state of the vault.

serviceResourceId.description: Gets or sets the service resource Id.

vaultType.description: Gets or sets the type of vault.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the resource.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of workflows.

instanceType.description: Gets or sets the instance type.

affectedObjectDetails.description: Gets or sets any custom properties of the affected object.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the friendly display name.

state.description: Gets or sets the workflow state.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the end time.

objectId.description: Gets or sets the affected object Id.

objectName.description: Gets or sets the affected object name.

objectInternalId.description: Gets or sets the affected object internal Id.

objectInternalName.description: Gets or sets the affected object internal name.

objectType.description: Gets or sets the object type.

replicationProviderId.description: Gets or sets the replication provider.

sourceFabricProviderId.description: Gets or sets the source fabric provider.

targetFabricProviderId.description: Gets or sets the target fabric provider.

allowedActions.description: Gets or sets the list of allowed actions on the workflow.

activityId.description: Gets or sets the workflow activity id.

tasks.description: Gets or sets the list of tasks.

errors.description: Gets or sets the list of errors.
